data.title: Famous German Basketball Players
data.meta_description: The World would have been much poorer without these famous German Basketball Players!
data.text:
1

Dirk Nowitzki

(Former German Basketball Player and One of the Greatest Power Forwards of All Time)

49

12

Birthdate: June 19, 1978

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Würzburg, Germany

Dirk Nowitzki is a German former professional basketball player and current special advisor for the Dallas Mavericks. Widely regarded as one of the greatest power forwards of all time, he played his entire 21-year NBA career with the Mavericks. Nowitzki led the team to its first NBA Finals appearance in 2006 and its only championship in 2011. He is known for his scoring ability, versatility, outside shooting, and fadeaway jump shot. Nowitzki has numerous accolades, including NBA MVP and Finals MVP awards, multiple All-Star and All-NBA selections, and being the highest-scoring foreign-born player in NBA history. In international play, he led the Germany national team to medals in major tournaments and was the leading scorer and MVP in several competitions.

2

Detlef Schrempf

(German-American Former Professional Basketball Player Who Played As a Small Forward / Power Forward)

33

3

Birthdate: January 21, 1963

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Leverkusen, Germany

Detlef Schrempf is a German-American former professional basketball player known for his successful career in the NBA. He played college basketball for the Washington Huskies before being drafted by the Dallas Mavericks in 1985. Throughout his 16-season NBA career, Schrempf played for teams like the Indiana Pacers, Seattle SuperSonics, and Portland Trail Blazers. He was a three-time NBA All-Star, All-NBA Third Team member, and two-time NBA Sixth Man of the Year. Schrempf also represented West Germany and Germany in international competitions, earning induction into the FIBA Hall of Fame in 2021.

3

Shawn Bradley

(Former German-American Basketball Player)

19

6

Birthdate: March 22, 1972

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Landstuhl, West Germany

Shawn Bradley is a former professional basketball player known for his impressive height of 7 ft 6 in. He played as a center for the Philadelphia 76ers, New Jersey Nets, and Dallas Mavericks in the NBA. Bradley is recognized as one of the tallest players in NBA history. Throughout his career, he showcased his skills on the court, contributing to his teams with his defensive abilities and shot-blocking prowess. Bradley's presence in the league left a lasting impact due to his unique physical attributes and playing style.

Recommended Lists:

4

Franz Wagner

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as Small Forward)

15

4

Birthdate: August 27, 2001

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Berlin, Germany

Franz Wagner is a professional basketball player for the Orlando Magic in the NBA. He previously played college basketball for the Michigan Wolverines and began his career with Alba Berlin in the Basketball Bundesliga (BBL). Wagner has been recognized for his talents, winning awards such as the BBL Best German Young Player. He has also represented Germany in international competitions, achieving success with the national youth teams. Wagner's skills and achievements have made him a promising player in the basketball world.

5

Moritz Wagner

(German Basketball Player Who Plays Center or as Power Forward )

17

3

Birthdate: April 26, 1997

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Berlin, Germany

Moritz Wagner is a German professional basketball player for the Orlando Magic of the NBA. He previously played for Alba Berlin and the Michigan Wolverines in college. After being drafted by the Los Angeles Lakers in 2018, he has had a successful career, earning accolades such as All-Big Ten second team selection, Big Ten tournament MVP, and being named to various tournament teams. Wagner has also represented the Germany national team and currently plays alongside his younger brother Franz Wagner for the Orlando Magic.

6

Maxi Kleber

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as Power Forward)

20

3

Birthdate: January 29, 1992

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Würzburg, Germany

Maximilian Kleber is a German professional basketball player currently playing for the Dallas Mavericks in the NBA. Standing at 2.08 meters tall, he excels in the power forward position. Kleber's career has been marked by his strong defensive skills, shot-blocking abilities, and versatility on the court. He has earned a reputation for being a reliable player who consistently contributes to his team's success. Kleber's dedication to the game and work ethic have made him a valuable asset in the NBA.

7

Daniel Theis

(German Basketball Player Who Plays Center)

16

4

Birthdate: April 4, 1992

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Salzgitter, Germany

Daniel Theis is a German professional basketball player who has had a diverse career in the NBA. He began in the Basketball Bundesliga, earning multiple accolades and championships before joining the Boston Celtics. After a trade to the Chicago Bulls, he briefly played for the Houston Rockets before returning to the Celtics. Subsequently, he was traded to the Indiana Pacers, having also made it to the NBA Finals during his time with the Celtics. Throughout his career, Theis has showcased his skills and versatility on the court.

8

Isaac Bonga

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as Point Guard)

14

3

Birthdate: November 8, 1999

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Neuwied, Germany

Isaac Bonga is a German professional basketball player known for his versatility on the court. He started his career with Skyliners Frankfurt before moving on to play for FC Bayern Munich in the Basketball Bundesliga and the EuroLeague. Bonga also represents the German national team in international competitions. He was drafted by the Philadelphia 76ers and subsequently traded to the Los Angeles Lakers in the 2018 NBA draft. Standing at 6 ft 8 in (2.03 m), Bonga's skills have made him a valuable asset in professional basketball.

9

Svetislav Pešić

(Head Coach of the Serbian Men’s National Basketball Team)

10

3

Birthdate: August 28, 1949

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Novi Sad, Serbia

Svetislav "Kari" Pešić is a prominent figure in the world of basketball, known for his dual role as a coach and former player. With a wealth of experience and expertise, Pešić has made a significant impact in the sport. Currently serving as the head coach of the Serbia men's national team, he has led his teams to numerous victories and achievements. Pešić's strategic approach, leadership skills, and deep understanding of the game have earned him a reputation as a highly respected and successful basketball professional.

10

Silke Nowitzki

(Former German Basketball Player)

11

3

Birthdate: July 12, 1974

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Würzburg, Germany

Silke Nowitzki is a former professional basketball player who played for several teams in Europe before retiring. She was known for her versatility on the court and her strong scoring ability. Nowitzki had a successful career, winning multiple championships and MVP awards. She also represented her national team in international competitions, leading them to medals and earning recognition as a top player in Europe. Nowitzki's contributions to the sport have solidified her legacy as one of the great basketball players of her time.

11

Oscar da Silva

(Brazilian-German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Power Forward)

8

2

Birthdate: September 21, 1998

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Munich, Germany

Oscar da Silva is a professional basketball player for Bayern Munich in the German Basketball Bundesliga and the EuroLeague. He previously played college basketball for the Stanford Cardinal. Known for his versatility and skill on the court, Oscar has made a name for himself as a dynamic player with the ability to score from inside and outside. His contributions have helped his teams achieve success at both the collegiate and professional levels, establishing him as a rising star in the world of basketball.

12

Isaiah Hartenstein

(German-American Basketball Player Who Plays Center)

14

3

Birthdate: May 5, 1998

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Eugene, Oregon, United States

Isaiah Hartenstein is a German-American professional basketball player currently playing for the Oklahoma City Thunder in the NBA. Known for his versatility and athleticism, Hartenstein has showcased his skills on both ends of the court. With a strong presence in the paint and the ability to stretch the floor with his shooting, he contributes as a valuable asset to his team. His dedication to improving his game and contributing to his team's success has made him a promising player in the league.

13

Dennis Schröder

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as Point Guard)

9

2

Birthdate: September 15, 1993

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Braunschweig, Germany

Dennis Schröder is a German professional basketball player currently with the Brooklyn Nets in the NBA. He started his career with teams in Germany before moving to the NBA. Schröder played for the Atlanta Hawks and the Oklahoma City Thunder before joining the Brooklyn Nets. He also owns a team in his hometown and led the German national team to their first World Cup title in 2023. Schröder was chosen as a flag bearer at the Paris 2024 Olympics.

14

Chris Kaman

(Former German-American Basketball Player)

15

3

Birthdate: April 28, 1982

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Grand Rapids, Michigan

Chris Kaman is a German-American retired professional basketball player who primarily played as a center in the NBA. He was drafted as the sixth overall pick in the 2003 NBA draft by the Los Angeles Clippers after a successful college career at Central Michigan University. Throughout his time in the NBA, Kaman played for several teams including the Clippers, New Orleans Hornets, Dallas Mavericks, and others. Known for his scoring ability and defensive presence, Kaman made significant contributions to the teams he played for during his career.

15

Maik Zirbes

(German Basketball Player Who Plays Center)

9

2

Birthdate: January 29, 1990

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Traben-Trarbach, Germany

Maik Zirbes is a German professional basketball player for Gladiators Treves in the German ProA league. He is also a member of the senior German national basketball team, competing in international tournaments. With a height of 2.08 meters (6 feet 10 inches), Zirbes plays as a center, utilizing his size and skills to dominate the paint. Known for his rebounding, scoring ability, and defensive presence, he is a key player both in his club and national team, contributing to their success on the court.

16

Maodo Lô

(German-Senegalese Basketball Player Who Plays as a Point Guard or Shooting Guard )

8

2

Birthdate: December 31, 1992

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Berlin, Germany

Maodo Lô is a successful German professional basketball player currently playing for Olimpia Milano in the Italian Lega Basket Serie A and the EuroLeague. Known for his time at Columbia University in New York City, where he earned the nickname The Chairman, Lô has showcased his skills on both the collegiate and professional levels. With a strong presence on the court, Lô continues to make valuable contributions to his team and has established himself as a key player in the competitive world of basketball.

17

Johannes Voigtmann

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Power Forward)

8

2

Birthdate: September 30, 1992

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Eisenach, Germany

Johannes Voigtmann is a skilled professional basketball player from Germany, known for his versatility in playing both power forward and center positions. He has showcased his talent in top leagues like the Italian Lega Basket Serie A (LBA) and the prestigious EuroLeague with Olimpia Milano. Voigtmann's impressive 2.11 m height gives him an advantage on the court, where he excels in both offense and defense. Additionally, he represents the senior German national team, further solidifying his status as a prominent figure in the world of basketball.

18

Paul Zipser

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as Power Forward or Small Forward)

14

3

Birthdate: February 18, 1994

Sun Sign: Aquarius

Birthplace: Heidelberg, Germany

Paul Zipser is a German professional basketball player known for his versatility at the small forward position. He currently plays for MLP Academics Heidelberg in the Basketball Bundesliga (BBL). Standing at 2.03 m (6 ft 8 in), he possesses a strong presence on the court. Zipser was drafted by the Chicago Bulls in the 2016 NBA draft, showcasing his talent and potential in the competitive basketball scene. His skills and dedication have earned him recognition as a valuable asset to his team.

19

Niels Giffey

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Small Forward or Shooting Guard)

7

1

Birthdate: June 8, 1991

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Berlin Berlin, Germany

Niels Giffey is a German professional basketball player for Bayern Munich in the German Basketball Bundesliga and the EuroLeague. Standing at 6 ft 7 in (2.01 m), he excels in the small forward and shooting guard positions. Giffey also represents the Germany national team. He played college basketball for the University of Connecticut Huskies, contributing significantly to their NCAA tournament victories in 2011 and 2014. Known for his versatility and championship-winning experience, Giffey has established himself as a key player in both domestic and international competitions.

20

Elias Harris

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Power Forward)

8

2

Birthdate: July 6, 1989

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Speyer, West Germany

Elias Harris is a German professional basketball player known for his versatility on both ends of the court. With experience playing in top leagues such as the Bundesliga and the EuroLeague, he has showcased his skills as a forward for Bayern Munich. Prior to his professional career, Harris honed his talents at Gonzaga University, where he made a name for himself in college basketball. Additionally, he represents the German national team, contributing his talent and experience to international competitions.

21

Arnold Van Opstal

(Filipino-German Basketball Player Who Plays Center)

8

2

Birthdate: December 15, 1991

Sun Sign: Sagittarius

Birthplace: Germany

Arnold Van Opstal is a Filipino-German former professional basketball player known for his contributions to the Philippine Basketball Association (PBA) and the Philippine national basketball team. He played for two teams in the PBA, showcasing his skills and talents on the court. Van Opstal also represented the Philippines in various international competitions, displaying his athleticism and passion for the sport. Prior to his professional career, he honed his craft playing college basketball for De La Salle University, where he further developed his abilities and gained valuable experience.

22

Satou Sabally

(German-American Basketball Player Who Plays as Small Forward)

17

4

Birthdate: April 25, 1998

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: New York City, New York, United States

Satou Sabally is a professional basketball player who currently plays for the Dallas Wings in the WNBA and Fenerbahçe in the Turkish Super League. She previously played college basketball for the Oregon Ducks before deciding to enter the 2020 WNBA draft despite having one remaining season of college eligibility. Sabally became draft-eligible due to meeting the league's minimum age requirement. Known for her skills on the court, Sabally continues to make a name for herself in the world of professional basketball.

23

Holger Geschwindner

(Former German Basketball Player and Coach)

7

1

Birthdate: September 12, 1945

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: Bad Nauheim, Germany

Holger Geschwindner is a retired German basketball player renowned for his involvement in the 1972 Summer Olympics representing West Germany. He gained recognition as the coach and mentor of legendary basketball player Dirk Nowitzki. Geschwindner is the founder of a prominent basketball academy in Würzburg, where he continues to impart his knowledge and expertise to aspiring athletes. His impactful contributions to the sport have left a lasting legacy, influencing the next generation of basketball players.

24

Makai Mason

(American-German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Point Guard or Shooting Guard)

7

1

Birthdate: May 4, 1995

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Greenfield, Massachusetts, United States

Makai Mason is an American-German professional basketball player known for his collegiate career with the Yale Bulldogs and Baylor Bears. He transitioned to professional basketball and most recently played for Baxi Manresa in the Liga ACB. Mason's skills and experience from playing in top college programs have helped him make an impact in the professional league. His versatility and scoring ability have been key assets in his professional career, showcasing his potential to continue succeeding at higher levels of competition.

25

Christian Standhardinger

(Filipino-German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Power Forward or Center)

12

2

Birthdate: July 4, 1989

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Munich, Germany

Christian Standhardinger is a Filipino-German professional basketball player known for his successful career in the Philippine Basketball Association (PBA). He has won multiple championships and individual awards, showcasing his talent and skill on the court. Standhardinger initially played in Germany and the United States before making a name for himself in the PBA. He has also represented the Philippines national team in various international competitions, contributing to multiple gold medal wins. Known for his versatility and contributions to different teams, Standhardinger continues to excel in the basketball world.

26

Tibor Pleiß

(German Basketball Player Who Plays Center)

12

2

Birthdate: November 2, 1989

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Bergisch Gladbach, West Germany

Tibor Pleiß is a German professional basketball player known for his time with Anadolu Efes in the Turkish Super League and the EuroLeague. Standing at 7 feet 3 inches, he excels in the center position and is a valuable asset for his team. Additionally, he represents the German national team, showcasing his skills on an international level. With a strong presence on the court and a knack for scoring and defense, Pleiß is a respected figure in the world of basketball.

27

Ademola Okulaja

(German Basketball Player Who Played as Power Forward)

11

2

Birthdate: July 10, 1975

Sun Sign: Cancer

Birthplace: Lagos, Nigeria

Ademola Okulaja was a German professional basketball player known for his successful career in Europe. As a 2.06 m forward, he played for the Brose Baskets in the Basketball Bundesliga. He also represented the German national team, earning 172 caps and winning bronze at the 2002 World Championships. Okulaja played college basketball at North Carolina, briefly considered the NBA, and later transitioned into a role as an agent for NBA player Dennis Schröder after retiring from playing.

28

Boniface N'Dong

(Former Senegalese Basketball Player Who Played Center)

5

1

Birthdate: September 3, 1977

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: M'Bour, Senegal

Boniface N'Dong, a Senegalese retired basketball player turned coach, currently serves as the assistant head coach for the Denver Nuggets. Throughout his professional career, he has made significant contributions to the sport, showcasing his skills and knowledge both on and off the court. With a background in basketball and a passion for coaching, N'Dong brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his role with the Nuggets, helping to guide and mentor players towards success in the competitive world of professional basketball.

29

Ariel Hukporti

(German-Togolese Basketball Player Who Plays Center)

8

2

Birthdate: April 12, 2002

Sun Sign: Aries

Birthplace: Stralsund, Germany

Ariel Hukporti is a professional basketball player for the New York Knicks in the NBA. Known for his athleticism and skill on the court, he has made a name for himself as a formidable presence in the league. Hukporti's dedication to the game and hard work have earned him a reputation as a rising star in the basketball world. With his talent and determination, he continues to make significant contributions to his team's success and is poised for a bright future in professional basketball.

30

Danilo Barthel

(German Basketball Player Who Plays Center or as Power Forward )

6

1

Birthdate: October 24, 1991

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Heidelberg, Germany

Danilo Barthel is a retired professional basketball player from Germany. He had a successful career playing for various teams, showcasing his skills and contributing to their success. Known for his versatility and strong presence on the court, Barthel made significant contributions to his teams both offensively and defensively. Throughout his professional career, he demonstrated a strong work ethic and dedication to the sport, earning respect from teammates, coaches, and fans alike. Barthel's impact on the basketball world continues to be remembered and celebrated.

31

Helga Nowitzki

(Former German Basketball Player)

6

1

Birthdate: 1940 AD

Birthplace: German

Helga Nowitzki had a successful professional basketball career as a German player, achieving recognition for her skills and contributions to the sport. She notably represented the West Germany national team at the 1966 EuroBasket Women, showcasing her talent on an international stage. Throughout her career, Helga Nowitzki displayed dedication, sportsmanship, and a strong work ethic, leaving a lasting impact on the basketball community. Her legacy continues through her children, who have also excelled in the sport, further cementing her influence in the basketball world.

32

Robin Benzing

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Small Forward or Power Forward)

6

1

Birthdate: May 1, 1989

Sun Sign: Taurus

Birthplace: Seeheim-Jugenheim, Germany

Robin Benzing is a prominent German professional basketball player known for his versatility on the court. Playing for Giessen 46ers in the Basketball Bundesliga, he also represents the Germany national basketball team. Standing tall at 6 ft 10 in, Benzing showcases his skills as a small forward. With a successful career in professional basketball, he demonstrates his talent and commitment to the sport through his performances in both domestic league games and international competitions.

33

Kostja Mushidi

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Shooting Guard)

6

1

Birthdate: June 18, 1998

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Uccle, Belgium

Kostja Mushidi is a German professional basketball player for Mitteldeutscher BC in the Basketball Bundesliga (BBL). Standing at 1.94 meters, he excels as a shooting guard on the court. Mushidi's skills have allowed him to make a name for himself in the basketball world, showcasing his talent and dedication. With a promising career ahead of him, Mushidi continues to contribute to his team's success through his scoring abilities and defensive prowess, making him a valuable asset in the competitive world of professional basketball.

34

Bryce Taylor

(Former American-German Basketball Player Who Played as a Shooting Guard)

6

1

Birthdate: September 27, 1986

Sun Sign: Libra

Birthplace: Encino, Los Angeles, California, United States

Bryce Taylor is a former professional basketball player who currently serves as an assistant coach for the Indiana Mad Ants of the NBA G League. He played college basketball at the University of Oregon before transitioning to a coaching role. In April 2018, he was granted German citizenship. Taylor's experience in the sport is further enriched by his father Brian Taylor's successful basketball career in the ABA and NBA, where he garnered accolades such as being a nine-time ABA All-Star and the 1973 ABA Rookie of the Year.

35

Sergio Kerusch

(American German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Shooting Guard or Small Forward)

5

0

Birthdate: January 6, 1989

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Memphis, Tennessee

Sergio Kerusch is a versatile professional basketball player currently active with Mitteldeutscher BC in the Basketball Bundesliga. Standing at 6 ft 5 in, he excels in the roles of shooting guard and small forward. His skill set and athleticism make him a valuable asset on the court. With his German passport, he has the unique advantage of having dual nationality. Kerusch's dedication and contributions have solidified his presence in the competitive world of professional basketball, earning him respect among fans and peers alike.

36

Willi Daume

(German Basketball Player)

5

1

Birthdate: May 24, 1913

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Hückeswagen, Germany

Died: May 20, 1996

Willi Daume had a distinguished professional career in sports, excelling in both basketball and handball. He represented Germany in the 1936 Olympic Games as a basketball player and was also recognized as a top handball player in the country. After retiring as a player, Daume transitioned into sports administration, serving as the head of the German Sports Federation for two decades from 1950 to 1970. His leadership and contributions to sports governance played a significant role in shaping the sports landscape in Germany during that period.

37

Demond Greene

(German-American Basketball Coach and Former Player)

5

1

Birthdate: June 15, 1979

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Fort Hood, Texas, United States

Demond Greene is a German–American professional basketball coach and former player with experience in top basketball leagues such as the EuroLeague, the Greek Basket League, and the German Basketball Bundesliga. He had a successful career as a player before transitioning into coaching. Greene also represented the Germany national team in international competitions like the FIBA World Championship and the Olympics. With his wealth of experience and expertise, he continues to make significant contributions to the basketball world both on and off the court.

38

Alex King

(Former German Basketball Player Who Played as Small Forward or Power Forward)

5

1

Birthdate: February 20, 1985

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Ansbach, Germany

Alex King had a successful career as a professional basketball player in Germany. Known for his longevity and consistency, he holds the record for the most games played in the Basketball Bundesliga. Throughout his career, he played for respected teams such as Alba Berlin and Bayern Munich. King also had loan spells with s.Oliver Würzburg, showcasing his versatility and adaptability. After a notable career, he made the decision to retire from professional basketball at the conclusion of the 2021–22 season.

39

Henrik R

(German Basketball Coach and Former Player)

5

1

Birthdate: March 4, 1969

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Offenbach am Main, Hesse, West Germany

Henrik Markus Rödl is a German professional basketball coach and former player known for his successful career in American collegiate and international professional basketball. He played for the University of North Carolina under coach Dean Smith and later became head coach for the Egypt national team. Rödl's skill as a 2.01 metres shooting guard/small forward led to numerous championships and he is credited with bringing other European players, such as Ademola Okulaja, into the North Carolina basketball program.

40

Anton Gavel

(Basketball player)

5

1

Birthdate: October 24, 1984

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Košice, Slovakia

Anton Gavel is a Slovak-German professional basketball coach and former player known for his skills as a combo guard predominantly at the shooting guard position. With a height of 1.89 meters (6 ft 2 in), he has made a significant impact in the Basketball Bundesliga, currently serving as the head coach for Brose Bamberg. Gavel's impressive career includes being honored as the Slovak Player of the Year four times. His contributions to the sport have solidified his reputation as a talented and accomplished figure in basketball.

41

Marie Gulich

(German Basketball Player Who Plays Center)

5

1

Birthdate: May 28, 1994

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Altenkirchen, Germany

Marie Gülich is a German professional basketball player who most recently played as a center for the Phoenix Mercury in the WNBA. She began her professional career after being drafted 12th overall in the 2018 WNBA draft. Gülich later joined the Atlanta Dream after being traded during the 2019 draft. Prior to her professional career, she showcased her skills as a center for the Oregon State Beavers women's basketball team. Gülich's talent and versatility have made her a valuable asset in the world of women's basketball.

42

Joshiko Saibou

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as a Point Guard)

5

1

Birthdate: March 7, 1990

Sun Sign: Pisces

Birthplace: Cologne, Germany

Joshiko Saibou is a talented German professional basketball player known for his skills as a point guard. He has played for various teams throughout his career, with his most recent stint being with JDA Dijon of the LNB Pro A league. Saibou's expertise on the court has earned him recognition for his strategic gameplay and ability to lead his team effectively. With a background of Togolese descent, Saibou brings a unique perspective and diversity to the basketball world.

43

Andrej Mangold

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as Point Guard)

5

1

Birthdate: January 14, 1987

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Hannover, Germany

Andrej Mangold is a professional basketball player from Germany. He currently plays for RheinStars Köln in the German Basketball League. Known for his skills on the court, Mangold has made a name for himself in the basketball world. With a strong presence in the league, he continues to showcase his talent and dedication to the sport. Mangold's contributions to his team and his performance on the court have solidified his position as a key player in the league.

44

Heiko Schaffartzik

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as Point Guard or Shooting Guard)

5

1

Birthdate: January 3, 1984

Sun Sign: Capricorn

Birthplace: Berlin, Germany

Heiko Schaffartzik is a retired German professional basketball player known for his successful career both domestically and internationally. He gained recognition as a talented athlete through his contributions to the Germany national basketball team. Schaffartzik's skills and dedication led him to achieve significant accomplishments in the sport, earning him a respected reputation among fans and peers. His competitive spirit and strategic gameplay have left a lasting impact on the basketball community, solidifying his legacy as a top player in the sport.

45

Ismet Akpınar

(Turkish-German Basketball Player Who Plays as Point Guard or Shooting Guard)

4

1

Birthdate: May 22, 1995

Sun Sign: Gemini

Birthplace: Hamburg, Germany

Ismet Akpınar is a Turkish-German professional basketball player currently playing for Türk Telekom in the Basketbol Süper Ligi (BSL). Known for his skillful ball-handling and scoring abilities, Akpınar has made a name for himself as a valuable asset on the court. With his dedication and hard work, he has consistently contributed to his team's success in the competitive BSL league. Akpınar's passion for the sport and commitment to excellence make him a respected player in the basketball community.

46

Gavin Schilling

(German Basketball Player Who Plays as Power Forward)

4

1

Birthdate: November 10, 1995

Sun Sign: Scorpio

Birthplace: Munich, Germany

Gavin Schilling is a German professional basketball player currently with the Basketball Löwen Braunschweig in the German Bundesliga. Standing at 6'9'' (206 cm), he plays as a power forward. Schilling gained experience playing college basketball for the Michigan State Spartans before transitioning to the professional level. Known for his versatility and athleticism on the court, he continues to showcase his skills and contribute to his team's success in the competitive basketball landscape of the German Bundesliga.

47

Isaiah Philmore

(Basketball player)

2

0

Birthdate: September 20, 1989

Sun Sign: Virgo

Birthplace: El Paso, Texas, United States

Isaiah Philmore is a professional basketball player who currently plays for Alba Fehérvár in Hungary. He was born in the United States but grew up in Germany. Philmore has established himself as a skilled player in the Nemzeti Bajnokság I/A (NB1) league. His dedication and talent on the court have earned him a strong reputation as a valuable asset to his team. Philmore's professional career showcases his commitment to the sport and his ability to excel in a competitive basketball environment.

48

Jan Jagla

(Former German Basketball Player Who Played as Power Forward)

4

1

Birthdate: June 25, 1981

Sun Sign: Cancer
